extendedInfo.description: Upward Mobility presents our NREMT Paramedic Exam Prep app for Android, perfect for the on-the-go EMS professional. Your satisfaction is important to us and we have a no questions asked refund policy for all our Android apps. We encourage you to try our application out risk free and let us know by e-mailing info@upwardpro.com if there are any issues.OVERVIEW:This module contains a targeted curriculum of 402 questions covering the required content areas for the certified Paramedic. All questions were written exclusively for Upward Mobility by expert writers who are NREMT certified, with a thorough and up-to-date knowledge of EMS material. FEATURES:*  400+ questions.* Covers all topics on the National Registry of Emergency Medical Technicians (NREMT) Paramedic Cognitive Exam:   --  Airway, Respiration and Ventilation  --  Cardiology and Resuscitation   --  Trauma   --  Medical  --  Obstetrics and Gynecology  --  EMS Operations*  Exclusive, intuitive interface.*  Study Mode -- Each question is paired with a clear and useful explanation. Study at your own pace!*  Test Mode -- Designed to simulate the exam experience. Set your own question and time constraints. *  Review your answers in both question-by-question and aggregate format.This app is not affiliated with NREMT.ABOUT UPWARD MOBILITY:Upward Mobility is an independent test-preparation apps company that creates high quality material that is witty and engaging, perfect for on-the-go students and ambitious professionals. All of our content is developed exclusively for Upward Mobility by writers who are subject matter experts and undergoes a thorough review process.We are a double bottom line company that is committed to education in the developing world. Some of the profits will be used to deploy education via mobile phone in emerging countries to improve their total factor productivity growth.Customer satisfaction is our top priority, and if you have any questions or comments or are unsatisfied with our products in any way, please contact us at info@upwardpro.com and we will do our best to help you.

reviews.comment: Not worth the money. Limited questions, poor grammar. Mediocre quality. There\'s 182 questions and that\'s it. NREMT-P
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: If you study this and only this odds are not good you will pass. this should only be another resource, people who fail the nremt-p don\'t blame this blame yourself
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok application - Good base foundation
reviews.comment: Ok for general day to day quizzing fun. Feels nothing like NREMT question banks. Remedial testing for Paramedic only. Some information conflicted with class instruction and Michigan State protocalls. Not comfortable stating it benefited me in the testing processing. Still feel that text books are the best preparation resource.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Decent number of questions, information seems accurate so far, but despite the paramedic title multiple questions are specific to intermediates.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Put together well in my opinion. Helpful, but I have found one wrong answer so far. Look up your cranial nerves.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Kim
reviews.comment: Questions are limited & not that similar to what is on the NREMT-P... Wasn\'t that much help & not really worth the money spent :-(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ehhhh
reviews.comment: Some minor help. I passed my test but there was very minimal similarity between this app and the NREMT
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love it. Works great on EVO. Been Paramedic for years, and it is fun to refresh on this Application.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awesome app. Works well on my samsung epic.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I feel this app will assists me with passing the National Registry Exam if keep using through school.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Really helpful for pcp course (in bc). Some questions usa specific of course but still really helpful to this canuck.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: How accurate is it to 2011 standards?also what is minimum sys bp for ntg? Takin comp test this week...been a medic for 11 years...let my nremtp lapse
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty worthless as a study aid
reviews.comment: No way to choose what category you want to be tested in. A lot of questions seem to be emt-b oriented. The same questions are asked multiple times.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very useful app, worth the money.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Focus your study efforts elsewhere
reviews.comment: I studied the material thoroughly and failed nremt  paramedic the first time.  There was different material than this format presented.  Most questions were scenario based on the test,  and you will be ill prepared if you use this app!  I used passmedic the second time and passed it.  Don\'t waste your time/money on this app.
reviews.author: A Google User
